Function Documentation

template<typename T>
Sort1st<typename T::value_type> makeSort1st (  T &  not_used  ) 
 

Helper for Sort1st, usage 

 makeSort1st( container );
.

This will help determine the type instead of explicitly specifying it which helps when the container type or value type changes. For example: 

 vector< pair< int, char > > somevector;
 for_each( somevector.begin(), somevector.end(),
           makeSort1st( somevector ) );
Instead of: 
 for_each( somevector.begin(), somevector.end(),
           Sort1st<pair< int, char > >() );

Parameters:
not_used Is only there to determine the type.
Returns:
a Sort1st of type T::value_type
